alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 12 at 1:22AM MDT until April 12 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ THIS MORNING TO 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Lea and Southern Lea County, the northwest and western Permian Basin, and most of Reeves County. * WHEN...From 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ this morning to 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. and a few power outages may result. Reduced visibility in blowing dust.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Southern Lea County
